title: State-of-the-Art NLP for Low-Resource Languages: A Survey
summary: This document presents a comprehensive survey of the current state-of-the-art in natural language processing (NLP) for low-resource languages. The authors review various approaches to NLP, including rule-based, machine learning, and hybrid models, and discuss their strengths and limitations. They also highlight some of the challenges associated with NLP for low-resource languages and suggest directions for future research.
